DOC.brief_summary: Study GIPF-002 phase 2 study design characterize biologic clinical effect IFN-g 1b . The objective Study characterize biologic clinical effect IFN-g 1b administered patient idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis ( IPF ) . The Study conduct multiple site enroll 30 patient IPF fail treatment corticosteroid .
